Model.description: The HR namespace is for defining facts about people, departments, and teams.

Type.name: Team
Type.description: group of several people associated together

Link.name: id
Link.description: A Person is identified by id which must be a URI.

Link.name: name
Link.description: A Person has exactly one name which must be a string.

Link.name: coachedBy
Link.description: A Person can have some coach which must be a Person.

Link.name: id
Link.description: A Department is identified by id which must be a URI.

Link.name: name
Link.description: A Department has exactly one name which must be a string.

Link.name: manager
Link.description: A Department has exactly one manager which must be a Person.

Link.name: department
Link.description: A Person has at most one department which must be a Department.

Link.name: id
Link.description: A Team is identified by id which must be a URI.

Link.name: name
Link.description: A Team has at most one name which must be a string.

Link.name: lead
Link.description: A Team has at least one lead which must be a Person.

Link.name: team
Link.description: A Person can have some team which must be a Team.
